item.description:
Hi Everyone...

Since I received such positive feedback about our first ever early dinner and cocktail hour at the Franklin Cafe, our NEXT Sunday event will be another early dinner and cocktail hour @ 5:00PM on February 15th at:

Gaslight, Brasserie du Coin
560 Harrison Ave
Boston, MA 02118
(617) 422-0224
Price: Reasonable
www.gaslight560.com (check them out on the web)

Gaslight, Brasserie du Coin, (literally brasserie on the corner) is The Aquitaine Groupâ€™s classic neighborhood Parisian brasserie.

I hope to see you at Gaslight!

Cheers,
Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up
